testObjects.gameObjects

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.AbstractBoard<GamePiece>
      • testObjects.gameObjects.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends AbstractBoard<GamePiece>
    An implementation of AbstractBoard that takes in GamePiece as the genetic type.

    • Method Detail

      • getRowAdjacent

        public int getRowAdjacent(GamePiece p)
        calculates the number of adjacent pieces in the same (horizontal) row as a given parameter piece (Including itself: e.g. A piece with no pieces next to it will return a value of 1)
        Parameters:
        p - the parameter piece to perform the calculation on
        Returns:
        the number of pieces that are in the same row as the parameter piece.

      • getColumnAdjacent

        public int getColumnAdjacent(GamePiece p)
        calculates the number of adjacent pieces in the same (vertical) column as a given parameter piece (Including itself: e.g. A piece with no pieces next to it will return a value of 1)
        Parameters:
        p - the parameter piece to perform the calculation on
        Returns:
        the number of pieces that are in the same column as the parameter piece.

      • insert

        public boolean insert(int position,
             int value)
        Given a position, this function will create a new piece and update the piece If the insert is successful, then a check will be performed to determine if
        Parameters:
        position - The column number to insert the piece. Do not use with array indexes
        value -
        Returns:
        True if the insert was successful, else returns false
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an incorrect position or value is given+

      • removeMarked

        protected void removeMarked()
        Searches the entire board for all removed pieces. Removes all the removed pieces on the board.
